extends java.lang.Object
    Constants that are used throughout the client

      • SYSPROP_DISABLE_DISCONNECTED_STRATEGY

        public static final java.lang.String SYSPROP_DISABLE_DISCONNECTED_STRATEGY
        This system property can be set to false if the reconnect behavior should be disabled when the client is unexpectedly disconnected from the broker.

        This is equivalent to setting DxlClient.setDisconnectedStrategy(DisconnectedStrategy) to null

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
